name: Bit.Trip Complete
description:
This COMPLETE version includes a video gallery with more than 25 clips telling the story of CommanderVideo, an image gallery with concept art, and an audio gallery featuring fan remixes, original songs, and demos of BIT.TRIP songs. All copies are packaged with a limited edition BIT.TRIP Soundtrack Sampler.

Only in COMPLETE will you be able to read six letters to BIT.TRIP fans, written by the series’ director.

Features

• All 6 BIT.TRIP games with new difficulty levels
• 120 new galactically difficult BIT.TRIP challenges!
• Chill to remixes and rare demos in the audio gallery
• Image and video galleries with exclusive, new content!

As of May 20, 2014, the Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection service for Nintendo DSi and Wii systems has been retired. Online features of this game are no longer available after this date but this game still provides an entertaining experience in offline mode.

To learn more about this service change, please visit To learn more about this service change, please visit support.nintendo.com/servicesupdate.
